alert.note: Alert for Benson; Ramsey (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Benson and southwestern Ramsey Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 914 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harlow, or 26 miles west of Devils Lake, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Brinsmade around 925 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Minnewaukan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
